name: Sould Dub
description:
Sould Dub is a casual 2D shooter. A cosmic threat is approaching the earth, huge asteroids are flying to wipe everything to smithereens. You have a pair of trusty Lasertron and Firezhor weapons. Souls Dub game has 5 great levels, 2 difficulty levels. And much more.. Also, the gameplay is directly tied to the time you spend on the battlefield, knocking down asteroids. Good luck, may the force and your laser gun be with you! Fly up and knock down asteroids and dodge them, go through all the bosses and protect the planet

peculiarities
Graphics: FunkoSS
graphics: Fedor Obraztsov
